oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Walker. Cas Walker.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Photograph by Tom Greene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cas Walker (left) and J.S. Cooper standing third from left with cigarette, at a Knoxville City Council meeting March 1956. Taken either shortly before or after a fist fight between the two men. The photograph was taken by Tom Greene and is used with the permission of his family. Cas Walker was elected Mayor of Knoxville in 1946, but was removed in a recall election shortly afterwards. He was elected to the Knoxville City Council in 1947 and served until 1971. Seated, l-r: James Walls, Mayor John J. Duncan.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fighting; Politicians;
